comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on October 03, 2023, 09:09:12 PMSo, as I was looking at other languages board I came across a familiar name and decided to check inside the thread to then find out that c.i.a was hiring foreign agents from this forum, and their agent is a  sex worker. don't be fooled by seeing a naked skin, they are able to cut your throat with one swing of a knife.Translated the content of OP, "QuoteWork with open sources.Hours: Full-timeSalary: $58,638 - $123,234 per year *Gender: MaleHigher starting salary possible depending on experience levelMinimum Requirements:Bachelor's degree, preferably in statistics, international, media or research political; Geography / GIS, Foreign Language / Linguistics or related field; Education and STEM degreesGPA of at least 3.0 on a 4.0 scaleStrong analytical skills; analytical and research skills; Written and Verbal RequirementsAbility to work in a dynamic environment as a member of a cohesive and often dispersed teamUS Citizenship not required.Qualification requirements:Foreign language, especially for unique foreign languages ‚Äã‚Äã(Russian language).Full information in English:https ://www.cia.gov/careers/opportunities/foreign-languages/open-source-exploitation-officer-1. html"Did anyone know about this? ¬†How many more of them are here? Just wanted to warn you that our "friends" are lurking in shadows and are very close.üòâPs, do you think they accept uneducated but pro hackers?üòÇ I am a bit confused.you have a link for a fuck and suck website vkcams.com the members name is a direct play on the websites name.the member can write ‚úçÔ∏è in Russian¬† and does lots of Russian posts.So are you saying the person is a male CIA agent?or a Male kgb agentOr some kind of a spy?

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: 1) VKCams is a known Russian and has not been online in over 4 1/2 years so whatever.2) If you read your link it even says you have to be a US citizenTake off your tinfoil hat and take your meds.-Dave

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: DaveF on October 03, 2023, 09:25:32 PM1) VKCams is a known Russian and has not been online in over 4 1/2 years so whatever.2) If you read your link it even says you have to be a US citizenTake off your tinfoil hat and take your meds.-DaveThere are three or four self proclaimed prude police trolling the forum at the moment.¬† Looks like the OP is a wanna-be-prude-tin-foil-cop trolling six year old (to the day no less) threads.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Dead. What you have found is a dead rat.Dear fellow campaigner: bringing here this case of someone who hasn't logged on to the forum for 4 years and whose thread is 6 years old makes me wonder if this isn't a joke:Quote from: DaveF on October 03, 2023, 09:25:32 PMTake off your tinfoil hat and take your meds.I recommend that you lock the thread.Quote from: DaveF on October 03, 2023, 09:25:32 PM2) If you read your link it even says you have to be a US citizenIt actually says not required.Quote from: digaran on October 03, 2023, 09:09:12 PMTranslated the content of OP, "QuoteUS Citizenship not required.

If you are, you can still apply, but please note that the conditions have now changed slightly, and US citizenship is now required:https://www.cia.gov/careers/jobs/open-source-exploitation-officer/Quote from: digaran on October 03, 2023, 09:09:12 PMPs, do you think they accept uneducated but pro hackers?üòÇPro hackers - definitely yes! Uneducated - I doubt it. You should try RGB (and their Lazarus Group branch) instead.

I think its just a waste of time playing this games with them. Possibly given them a big knock on their head like the Tom and Jerry play would serve them better

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: DaveF on October 03, 2023, 09:25:32 PMTake off your tinfoil hat and take your meds.Uh, yeah.¬† OP's whole description of what he thinks is being offered is just straight-up too bizarre to be true, even if the CIA was trying to pull some psy-op job advert.¬† On this forum?¬† It's much more likely to be total bullshit, because we've had it oozing out of every crack in the structure for years now.¬† Over time it's gotten to the point where I think maybe 30% of what people write is true, and that comes primarily from members who've been here for at least a couple of years.¬† Most posts are made by bounty hunters and others just trying to maximize their earnings from bitcointalk, so I think they just make shit up just to pump up their post count.But hey, that could be my own tinfoil hat malfunctioning.¬† I would never rule that out.
